document_data.name: Tal
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20210730214335/https://twitter.com/TheEdVerse/status/1421224959465119745| title = TheEdVerse on Twitter| accessdate = 30-6-2022| date = 30-7-2021}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Tal''' was a type of a [[nut]]-based dessert from [[Unther]], [[Mulhorand]], and [[Raurin]]. It was known as '''taunthaun''' in [[Thay]].
document_data.Description: Tal was somewhat similar to the [[Earth]]'s [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Halva halva] and had many closely related dishes across various nations of [[Faer√ªn]]. Tal was a very sweet morsel of molded and pressed ground [[walnut]], [[cherry]], and [[honey]], that kept well in the lands' hot climate.
